name: Tanks-Beyond-Repair
description:
Tanks-Beyond-Repair

Repair your tanks or scrap them for better upgrades, battle against your friend to build the best tank!

A 2020 Global Game Jam Entry (Theme: Repair)

Made in <48 hours with my friends William and Sunday

How to play
  • P1: Press WASD to move, Press C to pick up / drop upgrades
  • P2: Press Arrows to move, Press  slash / to pick up / drop upgrades
  • Let your tank pass through opponent's side to win!
  • Pick up and drop boxes into a tank to upgrade it! 
    • The only way to get an upgrade however, is to let a tank explode!!
  • Upgrades can be one of the following items, and each can heal at least 1 hp when applied on a tank
    • range
    • damage
    • attackSpeed
    • maxHP
    • movementSpeed
  • Be careful, your character can also be damaged and will lose if standing too long in front of a gun!
